text: Longiano is a comune in the Province of Forlì-Cesena in the Emilia-Romagna region in Italy. == Main sights == * Castello Malatestiano (castle, 13th century): now houses the Fondazione Tito Balestra, a museum of contemporary and modern art from the region of Emilia Romagna. * Teatro Petrella (19th century) == References == Category:Settlements in Forlì-Cesena
title: Longiano
